examples: had a stab at surfing once
The committee meets once a fortnight.
My family goes on a vacation once a year.
She once went down that political rabbit hole.
I do aerobics once a week.
words.defineEn: for one single time
words.defineVi: cho một lần duy nhất

examples: A work ill done must be twice done.
"I've done twice as much today as yesterday!"
You won't have to explain it to him twice.
These foods are potentially dangerous, yet nobody thinks twice before handing them out to their loved ones.
The dentist recommended that I brush my teeth twice a day and floss regularly.
words.defineEn: for two times
words.defineVi: hai lần

examples: The hotel provides fresh towels for the guests every day.
My grandma bakes a delicious persimmon pie every Thanksgiving.
Every age has its book, after all.
The apple tree in our backyard produces juicy fruits every year.
My son reads twelve pages of his book every day.
words.defineEn: (used before a singular noun) including or referencing all the members of a group of things or people
words.defineVi: (được sử dụng trước một danh từ số ít) bao gồm hoặc tham chiếu đến tất cả các thành viên của một nhóm đồ vật hoặc người

examples: The days passed slowly.
The day brings a sense of vitality and liveliness to the world.
The news really made my day.
The hotel provides fresh towels for the guests every day.
Our car has seen better days!
words.defineEn: a period of time that is made up of twenty-four hours
words.defineVi: một khoảng thời gian được tạo thành từ hai mươi bốn giờ

examples: Three players got their marching orders last week.
Our cat produced kittens last week.
My parents give me pocket money every week.
The rebels held the town for many weeks.
The week is divided into seven days.
words.defineEn: a period of time that is made up of seven days in a calendar
words.defineVi: một khoảng thời gian được tạo thành từ bảy ngày trong lịch

examples: The agreement followed months of negotiation.
The school semester starts next month.
We have a family gathering every month.
The permit runs for three months.
Each month she holds a meeting with her entire staff.
words.defineEn: each of the twelve named divisions of the year, like January, February, etc.
words.defineVi: mỗi phần trong số mười hai phần được đặt tên của năm, như tháng Giêng, tháng Hai, v.v.

examples: This job puts years on you.
The apple tree in our backyard produces juicy fruits every year.
Cancer kills thousands of people every year.
The apple orchard typically yields a bountiful harvest each year.
Company profits took a tumble last year.
words.defineEn: a period of time that is made up of twelve months, particularly one that starts on January first and ends on December thirty-first
words.defineVi: một khoảng thời gian được tạo thành từ mười hai tháng, đặc biệt là một tháng bắt đầu vào ngày đầu tiên của tháng một và kết thúc vào ngày 31 tháng 12

examples: My favorite smoothie recipe always includes the juiciness of a Jaffa orange.
My parents always took an interest in my hobbies.
My father always had a lead foot.
Election season always puts my dad's back up.
Always keep a backup of the file.
words.defineEn: at every single moment or every single time something happens
words.defineVi: tại mỗi thời điểm hoặc mỗi lần một cái gì đó xảy ra

examples: Tuesdays usually are my busiest days at work.
I usually have a peaceful sleep at night.
We usually have a family gathering on Thanksgiving.
The weather in this city is usually mild throughout the year.
The head teacher usually takes us for French.
words.defineEn: in most situations or under normal circumstances
words.defineVi: trong hầu hết các tình huống hoặc trong các trường hợp bình thường

examples: Retirement often brings with it a massive drop in income.
My vegetarian friend often uses beans as a filling for vegetarian tacos.
Parents often support their children financially during college.
Bad luck often brings good luck.
He often picks a quarrel.
words.defineEn: many times or on many occasions
words.defineVi: nhiều lần hoặc trong nhiều dịp

examples: The store sometimes offers discounts on certain items.
We sometimes have a barbecue in the backyard.
Sometimes darkness can show you the light.
She sometimes picked fights with other girls at school.
She sometimes practices yoga in the morning.
words.defineEn: on some occasions but not always
words.defineVi: trong một số dịp nhưng không phải lúc nào

examples: The queen and the males hardly ever leave the anthill.
I hardly ever leave my house.
We hardly ever get sick.
However, St John hardly ever joined in our activities.
We hardly ever talk about victims anymore um, in this country.
words.defineEn: in a manner that almost does not occur or happen
words.defineVi: theo cách mà hầu như không xảy ra hoặc xảy ra

examples: Rumors never passed her lips.
Meat and mass never hindered man.
Wonders never cease!
Wonders never cease!
A watched pot never boils.
words.defineEn: not even once in the past or not happening in the future
words.defineVi: thậm chí không một lần trong quá khứ hoặc không xảy ra trong tương lai

examples: The new president takes office in January.
In January, we celebrate the start of the new year with fireworks and joy.
January is the first month of the year and marks the beginning of the winter.
The spring semester at school starts in January and ends in May, with a break for spring break in March.
My birthday is in January, so I start the year with a celebration.
words.defineEn: the first month of the year, after December and before February
words.defineVi: tháng đầu tiên của năm, sau tháng 12 và trước tháng 2

examples: In some countries, February is known as the month of love and romance.
During February, the days gradually start getting longer as we move closer to spring.
February is the second month of the year and follows January.
They set a date for a full hearing at the end of February.
I bought a winter coat for nothing down and no payments due until February.
words.defineEn: the second month of the year, after January and before March
words.defineVi: tháng thứ hai của năm, sau tháng Giêng và trước tháng Ba

examples: The demonstrators marched in a body to the main square.
They follow their March show with four UK dates next month.
The dispute finally came to a head in March that year.
St. Patrick's Day is celebrated in March.
Lidl stole a march on other retailers by stocking pink prosecco in large volumes earlier.
words.defineEn: the third month of the year, after February and before April
words.defineVi: tháng thứ ba của năm, sau tháng hai và trước tháng tư

examples: The weather in April can be unpredictable, with both rain and sunshine.
Earth Day is observed on April 22nd to promote environmental awareness.
Despite the fact that the rain in April can be inconvenient, it is important to remember that April showers bring May flowers.
Even though the project was difficult and challenging, we knew that our hard work would pay off in the end, just like April showers bring May flowers.
Despite the fact that the rain in April can be inconvenient, it is important to remember that April showers bring May flowers.
words.defineEn: the fourth month of the year, after March and before May
words.defineVi: tháng thứ tư trong năm, sau tháng ba và trước tháng năm

examples: The delicate aroma of ripe may apples fills the kitchen.
The votes in the swing state may turn the tide in this election.
Finally the couple may be celebrating a birthday, a wedding anniversary or some other red-letter day.
A change of government may be on hand.
May I choose the restaurant?
words.defineEn: the fifth month of the year, after April and before June
words.defineVi: tháng thứ năm của năm, sau tháng tư và trước tháng sáu

examples: Candidates will sit the examinations in June.
She turns 21 in June.
The prime minister has called an election for 8 June.
The course runs from June 25th to August 27th.
Many students look forward to June because it marks the beginning of summer vacation.
words.defineEn: the sixth month of the year, after May and before July
words.defineVi: tháng thứ sáu của năm, sau tháng năm và trước tháng bảy

examples: The United States celebrates Independence Day on July 4th.
Canada celebrates its national day, Canada Day, on July 1st.
Fireworks displays are common in many countries during the month of July.
Many people enjoy celebrating Independence Day on the Fourth of July.
Clinton also had two personal strikes against him as he went into the home stretch toward the July Democratic convention.
words.defineEn: the seventh month of the year, after June and before August
words.defineVi: tháng thứ bảy trong năm, sau tháng sáu và trước tháng tám

examples: August marks the end of summer and the beginning of autumn in some parts of the world.
Some fruits and vegetables, like watermelons and corn, are in season in August.
The course runs from June 25th to August 27th.
The law went into effect on 1 August.
The case was continued without a finding until August 2.
words.defineEn: the eighth month of the year, after July and before September
words.defineVi: tháng thứ tám của năm, sau tháng bảy và trước tháng chín

examples: The season starts in September.
In September, the weather starts to cool down as autumn approaches.
On the seventh of September the clouds broke for the first time.
The school year begins in September and ends in June.
September is a good time to visit the beach and enjoy the last days of summer.
words.defineEn: the ninth month of the year, after August and before October
words.defineVi: tháng thứ chín của năm, sau tháng tám và trước tháng mười

examples: Many people look forward to October because it marks the beginning of the holiday season.
Halloween is celebrated on the last day of October.
The weather is very warm for October - it's an Indian summer!
High time that we now do what we failed to do in October 2008 when the financial crisis broke.
In October, the most popular scams involved health, interest rates, student loans, Social Security and warranties.
words.defineEn: the tenth month of the year, after September and before November
words.defineVi: tháng thứ mười của năm, sau tháng chín và trước tháng mười một

examples: November was closing in.
November is the month when many people celebrate Thanksgiving.
Many people enjoy watching the colorful leaves fall from the trees in November.
Employers added a net of 245,000 jobs in November.
My daughter's having a baby November 11.
words.defineEn: the 11th month of the year, after October and before December
words.defineVi: tháng thứ 11 của năm, sau tháng 10 và trước tháng 12

examples: My favorite month is December because of the holidays.
Many people decorate their homes with lights and ornaments in December for the holiday season.
December is the last month of the year.
Some people set resolutions for the new year in December, hoping to make positive changes.
Branches will be asked to close their books at the end of December.
words.defineEn: the 12th and last month of the year, after November and before January
words.defineVi: ngày 12 và tháng cuối cùng của năm, sau tháng 11 và trước tháng 1
